solution_line_template: The combined length of all the rope is {combined_length} feet because {rope_length_8ft} + {rope_length_20ft} + ({rope_length_2ft} x {num_2ft_ropes}) + {rope_length_7ft} = <<{rope_length_8ft}+{rope_length_20ft}+({rope_length_2ft}*{num_2ft_ropes})+{rope_length_7ft}={combined_length}>>{combined_length}
He loses {total_loss_from_knots} feet from the knots because {num_knots} x {loss_per_knot} = <<{num_knots}*{loss_per_knot}={total_loss_from_knots}>>{total_loss_from_knots}
The final length is {final_length} feet because {combined_length} - {total_loss_from_knots} = <<{combined_length}-{total_loss_from_knots}={final_length}>>{final_length}
